name: Codename Bebo
description:
Codename Bebo is a short 2D collection platformer created for the Legacy Mob Beginner's Game Jam! Run,  jump and double jump to collect cogs and oil cans and try to finish every stage with a solid 1000 points!

Move with WASD or the arrow keys

jump with Spacebar, W or up arrow

Jump again while in the air to do a double jump!

Tilesets by GameArt2d :  https://www.gameart2d.com/free-platformer-game-tileset.html

Soundtrack by TeknoAxe: http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

all other assets created by me. All premade assets are royalty free.

Made in Unreal Engine 4
